comments:
Build 20020612 (F3)

I was moving elements in the Java packages view among multiple source folders 
of a projet, and between projects, using both drag-and-drop and the refactor-
>move menu.  Not sure exactly the sequence, but I ended up with an entry in the 
list, for an element that had been moved away.  Deleting it deleted the real 
moved element (and lost my data :-()

The .log file contains:
